summary: ICP canister-based e-commerce storefront template with Internet Identity authentication, role-based admin access, product catalog, cart and checkout pages, plus an admin dashboard for managing products, categories, and orders. Includes a reusable build template (React + shadcn/ui) and deployment tooling.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister (core app API)
existing_features.description: Backend implemented in Motoko with main entrypoint and supporting modules, providing the core application API used by the frontend.

existing_features.title: Authorization & access control mixins
existing_features.description: Backend authorization modules (mixin-based) implementing access control checks for privileged operations.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication on frontend
existing_features.description: Frontend authentication integration with Internet Identity including login UI and actor initialization hooks.

existing_features.title: Role-based admin guard and access denied UX
existing_features.description: Client-side route/feature gating for admin pages plus a dedicated access denied screen.

existing_features.title: Profile setup modal
existing_features.description: Frontend modal flow to complete or configure user profile details after authentication.

existing_features.title: Product catalog browsing
existing_features.description: Catalog page with product cards and category filtering for browsing products.

existing_features.title: Product details page
existing_features.description: Dedicated page for viewing product details.

existing_features.title: Cart state management and cart page
existing_features.description: Cart provider/state management plus cart page UI.

existing_features.title: Checkout page flow
existing_features.description: Checkout page UI for completing orders from the cart.

existing_features.title: Admin dashboard for categories, products, and orders
existing_features.description: Admin pages to manage categories and products, view orders list, and inspect order details.

existing_features.title: Frontend app shell (header/footer) and state components
existing_features.description: Header/footer layout plus shared loading skeleton and error state components.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: Bundled shadcn/ui components and Tailwind setup for building the UI.

existing_features.title: Build template and deployment tooling
existing_features.description: Build template including Dockerfile, ICP config, workspace/package configs, scripts for image processing, and deployment script.

existing_features.title: Generated brand assets included
existing_features.description: Generated frontend public assets for hero and logo used by the app.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui for UI components and styling.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity; frontend creates an authenticated actor to call the Motoko canister.
Backend authorization is centralized via mixin-based access control modules.
Project includes a reusable build/deploy template (Docker + ICP configs + scripts).
Build template includes custom ESLint rules to enforce Internet Identity provider usage and prevent BigInt usage in query keys.
Build template bundles extended shadcn/ui component set plus image maintenance scripts (resize/prune) as part of the reusable scaffold.

generatedImages.description: Generated hero/banner image asset for the storefront.
Generated logo image asset for the storefront.
